MajorClaims.MC1: all of the old building which contribute to our sense of culture should be conserved

Claims.C1: old buildings process the most outstanding feature of areas which contain them
Claims.C2: governments can construct more accommodation instead of preserving old buildings

Premises.P3: Old buildings are an essential part of history
Premises.P4: Tourist often decide to discover the culture of a country when they visit through those old buildings
Premises.P5: the preservation of old buildings is also a ways to conserve our culture and everyone can learn much from them
